hops.message: Operations router properly included in FastAPI application
Router configured with prefix '/v1/operations' and proper tags
GET /my-operations endpoint properly implemented with authentication, filtering, and pagination
Uses get_current_user dependency for authentication - properly configured
Database session dependency properly configured via get_session
Fetches user operations from loading_manager with filtering and sorting
Returns structured JSON with operations, metadata, and endpoint links
LoadingStateManager properly configured as global singleton
Basic router activation test exists - confirms router is functional

defects.msg: No frontend implementation found for operations endpoints - missing client-side integration
No specific unit tests found for get_my_operations endpoint - only basic router tests exist
Import statement 'import time' at end of file should be moved to top with other imports
